posts.name: Al's Italian Beef
posts.note: Chicago-based chain known for overstuffed Italian beef sandwiches and hot dogs in a bare-bones space.

posts.name: Billy Goat Tavern
posts.note: A Chicago legend since 1934 associated with the Cubs curse and Saturday Night Live. 'Cheezeborger, cheezeborger' and more in an underground haunt made famous by a recurring SNL skit.

posts.name: Old Town Ale House
posts.note: Laid-back, cash-only dive bar near Second City with a storied past, old-school jukebox and funky art.

posts.name: The Publican
posts.note: A creative seafood and pork-focused menu plus global brews in a hip setting with communal tables.

posts.name: Publican Quality Meats
posts.note: An American cafe offering charcuterie, pastries and sandwiches along with an on-site butcher and market.

posts.name: RPM Steak
posts.note: Chophouse with a modern menu of prime cuts, raw-bar items and more in a sleek setting with banquettes. I hear you need to order the beef cheese burger and the lamb burger with middle eastern spices.

posts.name: urbanbelly
posts.note: Functional eatery whipping up hearty Asian fusion grub in straightforward digs with communal tables. I heard the thing to order there is their dumplings.
